mapper.insert: insert into t_mission_step(step_no, mission_no, step, step_title, step_content, step_time, mission_skill, userid) values(step_no_seq.nextval, #{mission_no}, #{step}, #{step_title}, #{step_content}, #{step_time}, #{mission_skill}, #{userid})
mapper.select: SELECT step_no, mission_no, step, step_title, step_time, mission_skill FROM t_mission_step ORDER BY step ASC
mapper.delete: delete from t_mission_step where step_no=${param1} and userid=#{param2}
